extendedInfo.description: IF YOU ARE HAVING PROBLEMS, EMAIL US AND WE CAN TROUBLESHOOT IT TOGETHER!  We can't fix problems from error reports alone.  We can't fix problems from comments like: 1 star "Won't load. This was an okay game but now won't even load"  BUT we CAN fix many problems that are emailed to us.NOTE: If your screen has a white rectangle at the top, go to the menu, open the "Manual" screen (may take a few seconds), then press the back key.Kingdom Forge is a medieval turn-based strategy game of conquest.It's like Chess, Risk and fantasy all rolled into one game.3 New, Quick tutorials:Very Quick Start - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kQU8k4s2u-0 - 54 sec.Basics - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jUwk_efL33A - 7 min.Spells - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A8uQ7YXa4C4 - 7 min.FEATURES: â¢6 unique classes of commoners and heroes to recruit (Peasants, Warriors, Sages, Monks, Rangers and Clerics).â¢3 different castles can be built, each with different attributes.â¢Each hero can advance to unlimited levels.â¢Spell-casting.â¢2 map sizes to play. (3 map sizes in FULL version)â¢4 levels challenge. (24 varying levels of difficulty in FULL version)â¢Can play against 1 computer player.(Up to 6 in FULL version) â¢Pinch to zoom in/out.â¢Save and load up to 10 games.â¢Original music score.â¢Detailed manual built-in.DEVICES: We have had one report that the Samsung Intercept does not display the screen correctly. If you have one, please let us know if it works on your device. **IMPORTANT**1) To get started, watch the YouTube short tutorial below OR click on "Quick Manual" in the menu of the game. 2) If you are having any troubles PLEASE contact us before leaving bad feedback. A great deal of time has been put into Kingdom Forge and we want you to enjoy it. Thanks!3) This LITE version should give you a good idea of game play and compatibility. Please try it before purchasing the FULL version.tags: fantasy, rpg, role-playing, risk, turn-based, board game, strategy

reviews.title: Alright game.
reviews.comment: Not great, took a long time to ready figure out how to use all menu buttons, but worst is I can not use the anvil (upgrade) on my units or keeps.  I have a t moble, g4 android.
